components.name: Identity, Security & Operations || Key Management Service

incident_updates.body: We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service. Please find below an update on the situation: Start time : 19/02/2025 14:20 UTC Ongoing Actions : Our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

affected_components.name: Collaborative solutions || MX Plan - Mailbox Access

incident_updates.body: We are currently experiencing an event affecting our MX Plan offer. Customers Impact : Customers will experience problems accessing their webmail, IMAP/POP and submission on Zimbra. Our teams are fully committed to investigating this issue and working towards a resolution as soon as possible. As investigations are ongoing, we will share any new findings or updates with you as soon as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

affected_components.name: Collaborative solutions || MX Plan - Mailbox Access

incidents.name: [Global][Domain] - Domains Name incident notification on lt tld

incident_updates.body: An incident is in progress on our Domain Names offer, customers in the impacted zone may face some difficulties. Please find the details: Start time : 18/02/2025 08:29 UTC Service impact : Customer with a .lt domains name are unable to perform some tasks. Ongoing actions : Our teams are working to resolve the issue. We will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident. We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

We have new information regarding the maintenance. Please find below an update on the situation: Update : Maintenance has been extended from 00:00 to 02:00. End time : 21/02/2025 02:00 UTC We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Web Hosting offer. This may temporarily affect availability. Start time : 20/02/2025 21:00 UTC End time : 21/02/2025 00:00 UTC Service impact : During this maintenance, you may experience some disruptions to our services on all impacted clusters. Specifically: • Suspension of traffic from AI and content indexing bots and crawlers on all impacted clusters: To prevent any potential issues, we will temporarily suspend traffic from AI and content indexing bots and crawlers on all impacted clusters. • Possible slowness on perso/pro offers : You may notice slower loading times or delayed responses when accessing your website or applications. In addition : • Possible slowness on metrics or logs on clusters 003, 006, 010 : Metrics and logs access may be delayed or slow during the maintenance period. • Possible slowness on mails on clusters 003, 006, 010, 011, 014 : Metrics and logs access may be delayed or slow during the maintenance period. • Difficulty accessing FTP/SSH on clusters 002 → 017 : You may encounter errors or difficulties when trying to access your FTP/SSH accounts on these clusters. Service improvement : This maintenance is link to : https://network.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/wh4jb8r0fn06 We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and appreciate your understanding as we work to improve our services. Thank you for your understanding.
